episheet

R functions for Modern Epidemiology.

Link to CRAN entry http://cran.r-project.org/package=episheet

Passing if devtools::check() error free

Because....vanity
Documentation

Click badge to see.

Text book

This package is functions to support the text book

Modern Epidemiology, Second Edition, by Kenneth J. Rothman and Sander Greenland.

Textbook website: krothman.org

Functions

Note - only 1 function has been mapped to R so far!

  • Rate Data
  • Case-control Power
  • Matched Case-control data
  • Risk Data
  • Study Size
  • O. R. Exact
  • Case-control Data
  • Quickcalc
  • P-Value Functions
    • pvalueplot Plot a p-value function
    • Example of use
  • Standardization
  • Seasonal Analysis
  • Meta-Analysis (contributed by T. Andersson & A. Ahlbom)
  • Cohort Power
  • Life Table

Complete excel tool

This package currently contains only one function. The complete set is available via the excel tool episheet.
